metadata.title: La Princesse de Navarre, :
metadata.creator: Voltaire,1694-1778
Voltaire, 1694-1778
Rameau, Jean Philippe, 1683-1764
metadata.note: Bound in a volume with manuscript title page: Mariage du dauphin avec Marie Thérèse d'Espagne le 23. février 1745 & pieces à ce sujet.
metadata.publisher: [Paris?] : De l'imprimerie de Ballard fils, reçû en survivance de la charge de seul imprimeur du roy pour la musique
metadata.physical-description: xvi, 106, [2] p., [1] leaf of plates :ill. ;21 cm. (8vo)
metadata.description: Title vignette, initial, factotums, head- and tail-pieces
Pages [i]-[ii], title-page verso, and p. [1]-[2] at end blank
Although published without music and not mentioned in the text, the music was composed by Jean Philippe Rameau
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Irregular pagination. Starts with number 6. Page numbers 65-80 are out of order. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
